resources.string: Welcome to Pomodroid, the opensource Android tool that lets you download tickets from a Trac environment, organize them in activities and face them according to the Pomodoro Technique. Pomodroid will automatically collect metrics while you are working. Press the Menu button to access all Pomodroid functionalities. THIS IS ALPHA SOFTWARE: please visit the official site: http://bit.ly/9Oi0Ir for more info and links to documentation. IMPROVE POMODROID! You can help Pomodroid in many ways. See the Project Wiki for info: http://bit.ly/aYyUuO
Tap one of the buttons in order to modify directly db4o database
Click the buttons in order to retrieve tickets from TRAC
Pomodoro finished. Take a short break.
Pomodoro finished. Take a longer break.
No Internet connection active. Please try again when a connection is available.
No Internet connection active. Please try again when a connection is available.
